attributes.action: Deport any illegal, Indefinite leave to remain, or foreign national criminal
attributes.additional_details: Deport any illegal, Indefinite leave to remain, or foreign national if convicted of any crime to free up space in our prison system, this will help manage our prison numbers, save costs of holding criminals who shouldn't be in the UK.
attributes.background: Deport any illegal, Indefinite leave to remain, or foreign national if convicted of any crime to free up space

rejection.details:
Immediately deport foreign nationals who break the law
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/732628)
